someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs
someone who sells things in a shop
a shop assistant in the men’s department of a large store
someone whose job is to help someone else of higher rank do their job
manager Jean Cundy and her assistant Cherrie Elliott
an assistant to a stud-farm manager
I spoke to the assistant director.
someone who works in a bank, office etc but who is not a manager
Bank assistants cannot afford to live on their current basic salary.
